NOW

I’m currently working on the following projects:

  • Fixing syndication and search features on our National Journal refactoring project
  • Reading the following books:
    • The Power of Habit
  • Building a tool to semantically analyze the text of large Congressional bills for key topics using OpenCalais
  • Lifting weights
  • Learning the Elixir programming language

I recently completed the following projects:

  • Refactoring the codebase of nationaljournal.com to use Django’s class-based views, along with a significant simplification of our JavaScript code
  • Read the following books:
    • The 4-Hour Workweek
    • Think
    • #GIRLBOSS
    • Anything You Want
  • Lifted some weights

This page was inspired by Derek Sivers’ Now, and I commit to updating it at least once per week. It was last updated on January 8, 2016 from Washington, D.C.
